text: Betapsestis is a genus of moths belonging to the subfamily Thyatirinae of the Drepanidae. ==Species== *Betapsestis brevis (Leech, 1900) *Betapsestis umbrosa (Wileman, 1911) ==References== * , 1921, Thousand Insects of Japan (Additamentum) 4: 850, 851. * , 2007, Esperiana Buchreihe zur Entomologie Band 13: 1-683 Category:Thyatirinae Category:Drepanidae genera
title: Betapsestis
